definition: tritium 3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China

sentences.english: Tritium emits a weak form of radiation that does not travel very far in the air and cannot penetrate the skin.
sentences.chinese: 氚发出的辐射很弱，在空气传播不远，不能穿透皮肤。

sentences.english: Xenon lung scans may be helpful in the early diagnosis of inhalation injury.
sentences.chinese: 氚肺扫描可能有助于早期诊断吸入性损伤。

sentences.english: The bound tritium in seashell increases slowly with time.
sentences.chinese: 结合态氚的形成和积累随时间呈缓慢增长的趋势。

sentences.english: Based on the calorimetric tritium method, an automatic tritium measurement device was designed.
sentences.chinese: 以量热测氚法为基础，设计了一套自动化测氚装置。

sentences.english: Based on the calorimetric tritium method, an automatic tritium measurement device was designed.
sentences.chinese: 以量热测氚法为基础，设计了一套自动化测氚装置。

sentences.english: The distribution characteristics of tritium in natural water in the area of Qinghai Lake is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了青海湖地区天然水中氚的分布及其变化。

sentences.english: The other radioactive material often in the cooling water of a nuclear reactor is tritium.
sentences.chinese: 在冷去水中通常发生的另一种放射物质是氚。

sentences.english: ER binding sites in tumor were determinedby tritiated estradiol binding method.
sentences.chinese: 用氚标记雌二醇结合法测定瘤内的ER结合位点数。

sentences.english: It is a naturally occurring radioactive form of hydrogen, sometimes known as heavy hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 氚是氢的放射性形式，有时被称作超重氢。

sentences.english: An infrared furnace(ULVAC RHL-410P) was newly applied to the extraction of tritium from concrete samples.
sentences.chinese: 使用红外炉发展了一种从活化混凝土中提取氚的方法。

sentences.english: The results showed that during the experimental period the specific activity of HTO in seawater decreased with time.
sentences.chinese: 试验期间，海水中氚的含量随时间逐渐减少。

sentences.english: A tritium atom has two extra neutrons.
Studies on carcinogenic effect of tritiated water is introduced in two parts.
sentences.chinese: 氚水的致癌效应研究工作包括两部分。

sentences.english: Obtained the services of a hydrologist to evaluate the groundwater tritium plume and to make recommendations for tracking the plume.
sentences.chinese: 获得水力学服务以评估地下水氚羽流并确认跟踪羽流。

sentences.english: Ion sputtering yields on T? Ti target are numerically calculated with TRIM program.
sentences.chinese: 应用TRIM程序模拟了离子在氚钛靶上的溅射产额。

definition: deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
protium 1H/light hydrogen, the most common isotope of hydrogen, having no neutron, so atomic weight 1

pinyin: fang4 she4 xing4 tong2 wei4 su4

definition: tritium/3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3
